Coat rack as a plant holder: Use the hooks or pegs on the coat rack to hang potted plants, creating a unique and functional display of greenery.
Coat rack as a clothing peg holder: Attach hooks or pegs to the coat rack to hang clothing pegs, keeping them off countertops and saving space.
Coat rack as a shelf organizer: Use the hooks or pegs on the coat rack to hang baskets or bins, creating a temporary storage solution for small items.
Coat rack as a pet feeder: Attach small containers or feed bowls to the hooks or pegs on the coat rack, creating a space-saving pet feeder.
Coat rack as a shoe rack: Use the hooks or pegs on the coat rack to hang shoes, keeping them off the floor and preventing damage.
